title: iOS 15.5 beta 2 hints at Apple Pay support for Bancomat and Bancontact networks
content:
Apple today released the second beta of iOS 15.5 to developers, and while the update doesn’t bring any significant new features, it does hint at some changes Apple has been working on under the hood. Code analyzed by 9to5Mac shows that Apple Pay will soon support Bancomat and Bancontact networks.

more…

The post iOS 15.5 beta 2 hints at Apple Pay support for Bancomat and Bancontact networks appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: iOS 15.5 beta 2 code analyzed by 9to5Mac shows that Apple Pay will soon support Bancomat and Bancontact networks.
